tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited Dr Chitra for my pregnancy checkups. She is a wonderful doctor, always calm and composed. She understands the patient and answers every question:) I felt I was in safe hands. Delivered a healthy baby just by following her instructions.

tags: None
review: She is very calm ,caring and friendly.and i had pleasant experience during my visit.she listened my problems and answered all my questions.i strongly recommend Dr chithra.she is the best gynaecologist in the area

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It is a boon to have have doctors like Dr. Chitra. She understands every patient and their anxiety, she is very calm and spends time in counselling and answering every doubt we have. Available on phone and email for urgent queries. Consulted Dr.Chitra for my second pregnancy, had lost first baby at 7th month in my first pregnancy. Unfortunately had a miscarriage in my second pregnancy. While I had lost all hopes of having a baby after two consecutive pregnancy loss, It was Dr. Chitra who gave me confidence that I can have a successful pregnancy and a healthy baby. Recently I gave birth to a baby boy.  Pregnancy was filled with complications plus GDM, while we were under tremendous stress, doctor stood by us and gave us hopes that everything will be fine. Delivered a preterm baby at 36 weeks, doctor took very good care of me, she has a personal touch to every patient. Cannot thank her enough, blessed to have consulted her.
reply_text: Thank you for taking the time to write this review. Your kind words and appreciation mean a lot to us at Sakra, and we'll be sure to convey your message to Dr. Chitra Sreenivasa Murthy. We wish you the best of health in the future! “

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
This hospital is just charging too much money **** ** ********** ** ****I was admitted in emergency due to severe pain in my right lower abdomen on 27-11-2019.Assitant doctor had consulted Dr Chitra Shreenivasa Murthy(Gynocology Department )on phone and was looked into the matter.Few surgeon came and visited but no conclusion was made.Almost all ********* test was done by that time.They said you dont have appendix or stone but could not give the reason behind my pain I was just given a probabillty for the pain.I came a day later to Dr chitra for follow up ,receiption people said I need to pay the consultancy fee again. I said I have already paid the consultancy which was infact 800 in emergency. She said she was busy in OT so assistant doctor saw and she was also not sure about what had happened.Infact I had called and taken time between 1-2Pm.
They had charged me Rs19283 and at end I am not aware of what happened to me.
The emergency charges are very high for this hospital Normal CT scan cost 8430 and in emergency it costed me 13160.
I will never recommend this hospital to anyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnant,Pregnancy Scan,Post Pregnancy Classes,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: I have come across with so many doctors so far in my life but out of all those, a few are really making mark in our mamory for the way they treat us. she is one of those. I was fortunate and thankful to one of my friend who suggested me to approach mam for pregnancy care and delivery. She handle our case very nicely and treated very friendly. Having delivery during this covid pandemic is really very challenging but the way she boost up and keep answering to our concerns over face to face consultation, telephonic call, email are really remarkable. I never felt hegitated to consult her for any kind of queries. In between of our pregnancy, unfortunately my wife got dengue as well but the way she supported us and ensure that the recovery should be faster with right set of treatment is very effective and I really obliged her for the same. Thanks mam for helping us out during entire pregnancy cycle and even after that. There are so many things to mentioned, really appreciated.
reply_text: Thank you for taking the time to write this review. Your kind words and appreciation mean a lot to us at Sakra, and we'll be sure to convey your message to Dr. Chitra Sreenivasa Murthy. We wish you the best of health in the future! “

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am very happy to have consulted Dr Chitra for a successful pregnancy. I had 2 consecutive miscarriages before consulting her.  I am impressed with the way she handled my case.  She is ever smiling,  very friendly,  patient and calm in listening patients' concerns. For urgent queries she is accessible over phone and email.  She never prescribed unnecessary  medicines and tests for me also she explained why a particular medicine is prescribed.  Though I stay far away from SAKRA,  I consulted Dr Chitra through out my pregnancy and delivery since I liked and trusted her. I highly recommend Dr Chitra for her experience,  ********* and the way she handles patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor is very friendly, always smiling, calm. She treats you like family and takes utmost care. She is very patient to listen all your questions and explains them nicely. In this pandemic times, I was stressed because of my pregnancy and delivery. After consultation I used to feel very relaxed. I had c section and she took good care of me. Thank you Ma’am for making my pregnancy easy for me.
reply_text: Thank you for taking the time to write this review. Your kind words and appreciation mean a lot to us at Sakra, and we'll be sure to convey your message to Dr.Chitra Sreenivasa Murthy. We wish you the best of health in the future! “

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor was very friendly and explained my health issues very clearly.  Was very positive and cleared all my stress and panic about my health issue.  Will highly recommend Dr. Chitra for gynac related issues.  Was very happy with the doctors diagnostic about my health issue.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
One of the most compassionate doctors I met,
She suggested diagnostic screening and refunded the consultation fees
And also 
She took it upon herself to follow the results and call me if necessary,
Sooo sweet, 
Nowadays where hospitals have become like corporate companies to find someone so caring and compassionate is very comforting!!!
Very very happy to have met her
We are blessed to have such doctors!!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Chitra is a very confident doctor and gives lot of positivity. Before we went to her we were consulting another doctor who told that the nasal bone of the baby was not visible and we should go for abortion. But Dr. Chitra confidently told us that nothing is wrong and she did not even recommend any further test telling confidently our baby will be normal. She does not see any serious issue. I was having gestational diabetes and she took care of me and my baby very well, went for surgery at the right time and with her help I was able to deliver a healthy baby!!! I will definitely recommend her

review: I visited Dr Chitra for my pregnancy, she was utmost kindly  and always stayed proactive for any symptoms during the 9 months, she helped me have a normal delivery with her team and I had a splendid experience even during the covid times. the hospital and team were very professional and I was very well taken care of. A special mention to the dutiful nurses who guided me on breastfeeding and were available round the clock with an ever smiling face and support. Peadtratician doctors and general physician who visited regularly to ensure both me and baby were safe. Dr sai shankar made us help take informed decision and was very gracious enough. peadratic doctors general physician who came regularly to ensure both me and baby were safe and sound. Altogether we had a beautiful experience.
reply_text: Thank you for taking the time to write this review. Your kind words and appreciation mean a lot to us at Sakra, and we'll be sure to convey your message to Dr.Chitra Sreenivasa Murthy. We wish you the best of health in the future! “

review: We had a very bad experience with this doctor and she always makes us wait for 2 hrs but she won’t be ready wait for her patients not even for 5 mins.We has to visit the doctor whom she had referred in the same hospital.we told will visit her back in 5 mins after showing the report to another doctor she said yes and left without waiting. As a doctor it is her responsibility to explain things from the report but she never explained anything clearly.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: doctor was very polite and explained to us the things to care of in pre-pregnancy as well.however reaching out to her after the consultation is a nightmare. her phone is always switched off and the hospital staff will never connect you to doctor even after informing that we are not in town.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Not happy with the waiting time, every time you visit waiting time is 2 hrs .. is expected that we don’t have any work and can wait endlessly. I understand Doctors are busy they have emergency cases and OPD etc .. but this problem can be worked out... rather than making every one wait for so Long.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
The wait  time was too much.doctor went on rounds exactly at 10:20 when I reached for my appointment at 10:20 am. Doctors shouldn’t go on rounds when they have OP patients..she came back after 1 hour..
Although I was on time I had to wait for an hour and that is not acceptable ..
Doctor was good but the wait time was not!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Tests,Gynae Problems,
review: Chitra was our gynaecologist when we planned our first baby and I must say we are extremely happy with her services. She will not give any unnecessary tension or tests and explains all the issues in a very simple way. She's good at identifying the issues quickly and always keeps her patients calm. Very friendly as well. Only problem we faced during our visits to her was the wait time but that's mostly to do with hospital management and emergencies. Will definitely recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Wait time was too much .I went at 10.45am and I could meet doctor at 2pm. I went there with my 2.5  year old son and I felt like it will be over by 12. But it took too much time my son started feeling hungry . It was really difficult  to Handel. Earlier reception people said it will take 30 min. But it took 3 hr
